attributes.action: Introduce a Fixed Payment Dog Licence for all dogs in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All dogs and puppies which are bred, imported or born in the United Kingdom must be registered within within 3 month of birth or 2 weeks of import, and the owner to be issued with a licence for a fixed payment and the dog to be issued with an identy tag with their licence number.  Any dog found not to be licenced will be impounded either for rehousing or to be destroyed and the owner fined and banned for 2 years from keeping dogs.  In the event that a dog causes harm, injury or even death, the dog is to be immediately destroyed and the owner is to be fined (to be fixed by the courts) or even imprisoned and banned from keeping dogs for life.
New Dog Wradens to be trained and to cover designated areas and to enforce the Licence, with help from the police if necessary.
